20101223010006.000|20101223010006.000|CC1|IMMINENT.                       
20101223010006.000|20101223010009.000|CC1|IN THE CROWN VALLEY AREA.       
20101223010009.000|20101223010014.000|CC1|EVERYWHERE FROM PALM DALE       
20101223010014.000|20101223010017.000|CC1|THROUGH PEAR BLOSSOM.           
20101223010017.000|20101223010022.000|CC1|THE SAINT GABRIEL FOOTHILLS,    
20101223010022.000|20101223010023.000|CC1|GLENDALE, EVEN DOWNTOWN L.A.,   
20101223010023.000|20101223010024.000|CC1|COMPTON AND DOWNEY.             
20101223010024.000|20101223010027.000|CC1|ALSO IN NORTHWESTERN RIVERSIDE, 
20101223010027.000|20101223010028.000|CC1|SOUTHWESTERN SAN BERNARDINO     
20101223010028.000|20101223010034.000|CC1|COUNTY, INCLUDING ARROWHEAD,    
20101223010034.000|20101223010035.000|CC1|WHEN WE SAID THERE WAS A FLASH  
20101223010035.000|20101223010036.000|CC1|FLOOD WARNING.                  
20101223010036.000|20101223010038.000|CC1|THAT MEANS FLOODING             
20101223010038.000|20101223010039.000|CC1|CIRCUMSTANCES ARE IMMINENT.     
20101223010039.000|20101223010040.000|CC1|THEY'RE OCCURRING NOW.          
20101223010040.000|20101223010042.000|CC1|IT'S MUD AND DEBRIS FLOWS AS    
20101223010042.000|20101223010044.000|CC1|MUCH AS A HALF INCH OF          
20101223010044.000|20101223010045.000|CC1|RAINFALLING WITHIN ONE HOUR.    
20101223010045.000|20101223010047.000|CC1|WE'LL BE BACK IN A FEW MINUTES  
20101223010047.000|20101223010048.000|CC1|WITH THE GOOD NEWS OF THE RETURN
20101223010048.000|20101223010049.000|CC1|OF THE SUNSHINE.

20101223010058.000|20101223010100.000|CC1|NORTH OF THE REDLANDS.

20101223010121.000|20101223010122.000|CC1|SPOT ROAD.                      
20101223010122.000|20101223010124.000|CC1|AT LEAST 40 HOMES HAVE SUFFERED 
20101223010124.000|20101223010126.000|CC1|SOME SORT OF DAMAGE HERE.       
20101223010126.000|20101223010127.000|CC1|WE'RE TOLD AT LEAST 100 PEOPLE

20101223010525.000|20101223010528.000|CC1|>> A WORST CASE SCENARIO TO BE

20101223010529.000|20101223010531.000|CC1|THEIR HOMES JUST IN CASE.

20101223010534.000|20101223010535.000|CC1|IS UNDERWAY.                    
20101223010535.000|20101223010537.000|CC1|GIANT BOULDERS, WHICH WOULD BE  
20101223010537.000|20101223010539.000|CC1|DROPPED INTO THE TWO BREACHES.  
20101223010539.000|20101223010541.000|CC1|THE CONCRETE WAS LAID HERE IN   
20101223010541.000|20101223010542.000|CC1|THE 1960s.

20101223010547.000|20101223010548.000|CC1|THIS FAR UPSTREAM YET.          
20101223010548.000|20101223010550.000|CC1|>> THIS CREEK GETS SWOLLEN.     
20101223010550.000|20101223010554.000|CC1|I HAVE SEEN IT ALMOST CREST TO  
20101223010554.000|20101223010555.000|CC1|THIS BANK HERE.                 
20101223010555.000|20101223010556.000|CC1|>> Reporter: NO CRESTING TODAY, 
20101223010556.000|20101223010558.000|CC1|BUT THE LEVEES HAVE TO STAY IN  
20101223010558.000|20101223010600.000|CC1|PLACE, IF THIS PORTION OF SAN

20101223010625.000|20101223010627.000|CC1|THE WATER LEVELS HAVE SUBSIDED

20101223010727.000|20101223010729.000|CC1|SOMETHING INTERESTING AND       
20101223010729.000|20101223010729.000|CC1|POSITIVE.                       
20101223010729.000|20101223010731.000|CC1|THIS RUNOFF IS CLEAR.

20101223013638.000|20101223013640.000|CC1|OF SNOW, IS THAT AMAZING?       
20101223013640.000|20101223013642.000|CC1|CHECK OUT MAMMOTH MOUNTAIN.

20101223013644.000|20101223013647.000|CC1|OF OUR VIEWERS, JOYCE GAIL OF
